SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(rsvt_no) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(rsvt_no) + 1 END as rsvt_no FROM rsvt
INSERT INTO rsvt( rsvt_no, biz_no, user_id, rsvt_ymd, rsvt_tm, rsvt_nope, rsvt_want, rsvt_stts, alarm_yn ) VALUES( #{rsvtNo}, #{bizNo}, #{userId}, #{rsvtYmd}, #{rsvtTm}, #{rsvtNope}, #{rsvtWant}, #{rsvtStts}, #{alarmYn} )

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(rsvt_menu_no) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(rsvt_menu_no) + 1 END as rsvt_menu_no FROM rsvt_menu
INSERT into rsvt_menu( rsvt_menu_no, rsvt_no, menu_no, amount, user_id ) VALUES( #{rsvtMenuNo}, #{rsvtNo}, #{menuNo}, #{amount}, #{userId} )

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(pay_no) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(pay_no) + 1 END as pay_no FROM rsvt_payment
INSERT INTO rsvt_payment VALUES( #{payNo}, #{rsvtNo}, sysdate, (SELECT SUM (subquery."prc*menu") AS totalSum FROM ( SELECT( SELECT amount * menu_prc FROM biz_menu WHERE menu_no = rsvt_menu.menu_no ) AS "prc*menu" FROM rsvt_menu WHERE rsvt_no = #{rsvtNo} ) subquery), '카드결제')
mapper.select: SELECT b.biz_nm, b.bgng_tm, c.common_nm AS openTime, b.end_tm, cc.common_nm AS closeTime, r.*, ccc.common_nm AS rsvtTime FROM biz_mem b INNER JOIN rsvt r ON b.biz_no = r.biz_no INNER JOIN common_code c ON c.common_code = '007' AND c.common_detail_code = b.bgng_tm INNER JOIN common_code cc ON cc.common_detail_code = b.end_tm INNER JOIN common_code ccc ON ccc.common_detail_code = r.rsvt_tm WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT r.*, m.*, p.*, b.*, bm.biz_nm FROM rsvt r JOIN rsvt_menu m ON r.rsvt_no = m.rsvt_no JOIN rsvt_payment p ON p.rsvt_no = r.rsvt_no JOIN biz_menu b ON b.menu_no = m.menu_no JOIN biz_mem bm On b.biz_no = bm.biz_no WHERE r.rsvt_no = #{rsvtNo}

SELECT r.*, m.*, b.biz_nm, b.bgng_tm, c.common_nm AS openTime, b.end_tm, cc.common_nm AS closeTime, ccc.common_nm AS rsvtTime FROM rsvt r INNER JOIN mem m ON r.user_id = m.user_id INNER JOIN biz_mem b ON r.biz_no = b.biz_no INNER JOIN common_code c ON c.common_code = '007' AND c.common_detail_code = b.bgng_tm INNER JOIN common_code cc ON cc.common_detail_code = b.end_tm INNER JOIN common_code ccc ON ccc.common_detail_code = r.rsvt_tm WHERE rsvt_no = #{rsvtNo}
select r.rsvt_no, b.biz_nm, m.* from biz_mem b, rsvt r, biz_menu m where b.biz_no = r.biz_no and r.biz_no = m.biz_no and r.rsvt_no = #{rsvtNo}
